extension.summary: IPTV client for playlists managed by Ottplayer (https://ottplayer.es)
extension.description: IPTV client for playlists managed by Ottplayer - a service that allows you to collect all your IP-TV in one playlist, adjust the channel order, receive electronic program guide.
